entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Muncho Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:58 AM PST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muncho Lake 2:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.5°C
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023
